SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
A class that represents a deck of Cards. It contains a stack with all the Cards of a certain type.
See Also:
